name: Transport Trouble
description:
By Brian Cao, Jake Nguyen, Noor Haider, Paul Lee, and Pierce Sullivan

Tap left click to move right. Hold and release to move left.

CMPM 170 Game Design Studio I (Senior Capstone) Project @ UCSC

Github: https://github.com/plee30/Transport_Trouble

Using the Crisp Game Library

https://github.com/abagames/crisp-game-lib & https://github.com/JunoNgx/crisp-game-lib-tutorial.
